Theme: Unfortunate Love

column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:
For the lovers of all time,
who can break the spell of romance?
column6:
For lovers caught in eternal time,
who can break the spell of romance?

column3: 娘娘 福子已经死了
column6: Your Highness, Fuzi is dead.
Dead?
How come?
When did this happen?
Her swollen corpse was just pulled out of a well.

column3: 娘娘面前 说话也不怕忌讳
column6:
Do you not care about respecting taboos
in front of Her Highness?

column3: 定是娘娘那天骂了她两句
column6: It's all right.

That day, Her Highness scolded Fuzi
and she ran out of the chamber, crying.

column3: 没看清楚路 跌到井里了
column6: She must have misstepped and stumbled in the dark.

column3: 如此说来 倒是本宫的错了
column6: So it's my fault?
Of course not.

column3: 做奴才的哪能不被说两句
column6: It was her own fault for having such a bad temper.
All servants hear criticism sometimes.
Don't you agree, Jiang Fujiang?
Your Highness... I dare not voice my opinion.
What are you afraid of?

column3: 你不信就问问翊坤宫上下
column6: If you're in doubt, you can ask anyone in my palace

column3: 是不是亲眼见她跑出去的
column6:
if they didn't see Fuzi running out
with their own two eyes.
Are you suggesting

column3: 难不成是有人从后面推她了
column6: that someone pushed her from behind?
I wouldn't dare.
But you did!

column3: 大可拿本宫宫里的人一一去查
column6:
You can investigate each and every member of my palace
if you don't believe me.
Your Highness, that wasn't my intention.
Let me be more direct:

column3: 你今儿个来定是奉了皇后的旨意
column6:
You're here at the Empress's behest
to investigate Fuzi's death.

column3: 你问了 本宫答了 也有人证
column6: You have asked. I have answered.
And there are witnesses.
You are permitted to take away my servants.

column3: 否则今后再拿此事与本宫罗嗦
column6: But if you trouble me again,
I won't be so kind.
Your Highness, I shall take my leave.
All of you, remember:

column3: 那小福子是自己跑出去
column6: Fuzi ran out by herself.
She slipped and fell into the well.
Yes, sir.
My Lady, it smells so fragrant.

column3: 午膳吃不下 晚膳也没用
column6:
My Lady, you haven't eaten
after you had a shock yesterday.

column3: 今儿早上好歹应该吃点东西吧
column6: You should at least eat something this morning.

column3: 一时的惊吓倒也不要紧
column6: A moment of fright doesn't matter.

column3: 只怕以后都要处在惊吓之中
column6:
What I'm worried about is
having to live in fear every day.
Why?
Attendant Xia was insolent,

column3: 可见我与眉庄树敌不少
column6: and that shows how many enemies Meizhuang and I have.

column3: 华妃强势 手段更是毒辣
column6:
Consort Fleur is imperious,
and her tactics are merciless.

With so many daggers poised
over my back and stomach,

column3: 不能保全自身也就罢了
column6: it wouldn't matter if they prevailed over me,

but my whole family would suffer if I
received any punishment.
What should we do?
I don't know...

My Lady, do you remember how we often made
osmanthus flower honey at home?

column3: 不如我去折些来给小主腌了吃
column6:
Now that we have so many osmanthus flowers,
how about I marinate some in sugar?
Would you like that?

Your cooking is always delightful.
I will eat it if you make some.
Yes.
I'll get some help.

column3: 佩儿 你在瞧什么呢 这么有趣
column6:
Violet, what are you looking at?
You look intrigued.

column3: 小主快看 这蚂蚁搬糖好奇怪呢
column6: My Lady, Look. The ants are moving strangely.

column3: 你瞧这蚂蚁一直绕着海棠树根走
column6: They keep moving around the root of the crabapple tree.

column3: 奴婢倒觉得这些蚂蚁真笨
column6: They seem to be avoiding something.
I think the ants are stupid for taking such a long detour.

column3: 把这蚂蚁绕开的地方掘开看看
column6: Xiao-Yunzi, dig around here and see what's underneath.
Understood.

column3: 这 这什么呀 埋得这么深
column6: What's this, buried so deep?

column3: 小主 这儿有个罐子

column6: My Lady, there's a jar here.
Take it out.
What is it?
Pull harder.
Here, let me take a look.
Go away.
What a strange jar.
It has a strong scent.

column3: 这碎玉轩原来是芳贵人住的
column6: It could be something that belonged to Noble Lady Parfum.

She was favored by the Emperor, but got banished to the
Cold Palace after her miscarriage.

column3: 这里边是不是什么稀罕的香料啊
column6: Could it be some rare incense?

column3: 小主爱香 那不如就打开看看

column6: My Lady likes incense. Let's open the jar and have a look.
Here, give it to me.
Unwrap it.

column3: 什么呀 这么冲鼻子

column6: It's so foul!

column3: 不过是一些不值钱的散香
column6: What a pungent smell!
It's just some cheap incense.
Jade, put it away.
You must not say anything about what we found today.

column3: 免得叫人拿住了说闲话
column6: Yes.
We wouldn't want people gossiping about it.
Vermilion, let's have the osmanthus dessert tomorrow.
Everyone, disperse.
Go back to your work.
Jade, let's go inside.
Take it away.
What's wrong, My Lady? You look unwell.
I feel sick and flustered.

column3: 浣碧 你去找温太医来瞧瞧
column6: Jade, can you bring Dr. Wen here?

column3: 记着 必得是温太医
column6: Remember, it has to be him.

column3: 温大人 幸好有您在
column6: Dr. Wen!
I'm glad you're on shift.

My Lady is not feeling well.
Please go and see her right away.
Is My Lady all right?

column3: 小主说只要大人您去瞧
column6: She told me that you have to be the one who examines her.
Please go quickly.
Yes.

column3: 小主似乎受到了很大的惊吓
column6: My Lady, you had quite a fright.

column3: 我看到了一些本不该看到的东西
column6: I saw things I shouldn't have.

column3: 那就要想办法忘掉那些东西
column6: You should try to put them out of your mind.

column3: 大人的承诺不知是否还当真
column6:
Dr Wen, will you keep the promise
you made to me outside the temple?

column3: 当真 永远事事以你为重
column6: Yes, I will forever put you before everything else.

column3: 永远二字 说来简单
column6: "Forever" is easy to say

column3: 若真做起来只怕是很难了
column6: but hard to commit to.

column3: 唯一值得一提的就是重诺而已
column6:
I know I fall short elsewhere.
My only virtue is that I can keep a promise.
We met in childhood,

column3: 甄家救父之恩 没齿难忘
column6:
and your father's kindness to my family
will not be forgotten, even in my old and toothless days.
My Lady, I will do anything you ask.
I don't want to share the emperor's bed.

column3: 虽然微臣的心中也不愿小主侍寝
column6: Although that is also what my heart desires,
since you have entered the palace, it is unavoidable.

column3: 为前程计 还是越早越好啊
column6:
For you life ahead, I hope you can
do it sooner, My Lady.
But I'm too scared
to serve His Majesty now.

column3: 温大人 我给你看样东西
column6: Dr. Wen, I'd like to show you something.

column3: 小主怎么会有这样的东西
column6: How did this come into your possession, My Lady?
The crabapple tree in my courtyard

column3: 今年春天便开始不开花了
column6: did not bloom this spring.

column3: 我今日机缘巧合在树下挖出此物
column6: I accidentally discovered a jar under the tree.

column3: 听闻从前住在这里的芳贵人

column6: I've heard of Lady Parfum's unexpected miscarriage.

column3: 想来也是这些东西的缘故
column6: I suppose this is the cause

column3: 可见宫中勾心斗角多厉害
column6: and a trace of the fierce rivalries in the palace.

column3: 都不知道自己折损谁手
column6:
Lady Parfum might never have scented
the cause of her despair.
It was a timely discovery.
Otherwise, all the girls in your palace would have been affected.

column3: 微臣自知无福陪伴小主一生
column6: Although I cannot spend my life beside you,

column3: 但若能够保护小主一世周全
也算是成全了当日的承诺
column6:
my promise will be fulfilled
if I can be the guardian of your welfare.
Is my illness serious?

column3: 受惊发热 重在疗心
column6:
The internal heat caused by the shock must be
treated emotionally.

column3: 若好好医治 不出半月也就好了
column6: It will be cured in half a month if you take care.

But if you wish, I'll prescribe a formula
for a gradual and comprehensive recovery.

column3: 这麝香仁是在麝香中药性最烈者
小主实在不宜放在身边
column6:
Musk can cause miscarriage or infertility.
You shouldn't keep this near you.

column3: 他日入药 也算了了一桩罪孽
column6:
Allow me find a purpose for it at the Imperial Infirmary
to make amends for its past crimes.

column3: 温大人 我实在害怕
column6: Dr. Wen...
I can't shake off my fear.
Don't be afraid.

column3: 流朱 送温大人出去
column6: Vermilion,
escort Dr. Wen out.
Yes.

column3: 莞常在病了 昨儿还好好的
column6:
Attendant Sourire is sick?
She was well yesterday.

column3: 又兼心悸受惊 诱发时疾
column6:
The evil qi invaded her body and induced heart palpitations.
Attendant Sourire contracted a seasonal illness.
She needs to rest in quarantine.
Heart palpitations?

column3: 是 也就是受惊过度
column6: Due to intense fright.

column3: 小主现在浑身发热 呓语不断
column6:
Attendant Sourire has a high fever
and experiences difficulty talking.

column3: 那淳常在就得搬离碎玉轩避疾了
column6: In that case, Attendant Chun must move out.
Yes.

column3: 莞常在又是内外并发之症
column6:
Attendant Sourire's illness has internal and external factors,
and can be infectious with the change of seasons.

column3: 微臣怕万一染及其他小主贵体
column6: I'm afraid if other concubines catch the disease...

column3: 既然莞常在的病是你瞧的
column6: Attendant Chun will move out then.

column3: 这一时三刻怕也好不了
column6:
Since you diagnosed Attendant Sourire's illness,
you should continue to tend to her.
Your Majesty, I will spare no effort.

column3: 今日新晋的宫嫔可以侍寝了
column6:
Starting tonight, the new concubines can
serve Your Majesty.

column3: 皇上还打算去华妃那里吗
column6: Would Your Majesty still prefer to visit Consort Fleur?

column3: 你是在试探朕的心意吗
column6: Are you probing my intentions?
I dare not speculate about Your Majesty's mind.
The Attendance Services will present the name tags.
Your Majesty, please turn over a name tag.
Where's the name tag for Attendant Sourire?

column3: 今天午后太医院来人禀报
column6: Your Majesty, the Imperial Infirmary reported this afternoon

column3: 说莞常在心悸受惊 突发时疾
column6: that Attendant Sourire contracted a plague due to emotional distress.
She is required to rest in quarantine.

column3: 华妃当着莞常在 沈贵人
column6: Emotional distress?

column3: 下令赐了夏常在一丈红
column6:
Consort Fleur granted Attendant Xia "Three Yards of Red"
in front of Attendant Sourire, Lady Shen, and Companion An.

column3: 夏常在她现在已经残废了
column6: Attendant Xia has become... paralyzed.
What did she do this for?
Attendant Xia was disrespectful and intended to beat a concubine.
But Consort Fleur's punishment was too harsh.

column3: 在宫里动手是该给点教训

column6:
Attendant Xia should learn a lesson
about attempting to use violence in the palace.

column3: 不明不白地掉在井里了
column6: Consort Fleur's maid, Fuzi, died in a well for unknown reasons.
And Attendant Sourire saw her dead body.
For unknown reasons?
What did Consort Fleur say?

column3: 可是江福海觉得有不妥的地方
column6:
She said Fuzi lost her footing,
but Jiang Fuhai believes there were other reasons.

column3: 宫女好歹也是出身八旗的
column6: Maids are from the Eight Banners.
Consort Fleur...
Keep investigating.
Attendant Sourire is sick ...

column3: 沈贵人和安答应还好好的
column6: Noble Lady Shen and Companion An were not affected.
[Noble Lady Shen]
Congratulations, Noble Lady Shen.

column3: 皇上翻的是贵人您的牌子
column6: My Lady, His Majesty selected your name tag tonight.

column3: 皇上的恩宠您是头一个
column6:
Among all the new concubines,
you are the first one to be favored by His Majesty.
Thank you, sir.
Lunar.
Thank you, sir.

column3: 小主啊 您还不赶紧拾掇拾掇
column6: No need to thank me.

My Lady, you should get ready quickly
to serve His Majesty.
But... What...

column3: 这位是宫里司寝的刘嬷嬷
column6: This is Madam Liu. She prepares concubines for service.
Please let her go over the rules with you, My Lady.

column3: 就要来接小主去养心殿了
column6:
You will soon be taken to the Hall of Mental Cultivation
by the Phoenix Carriage.
My Lady, await your blessings.
I will take my leave.
Take care, sir.
Your Majesty, Noble Lady Shen is here.
Carry her in.
Your Majesty.

column3: 皇上就赏了这么多 真是有心
column6:
My Lady, you like chrysanthemums,
so His Majesty gifted all these to you. How thoughtful!

column3: 秋天除了赏菊花 还能赏什么
column6: That's the only flower we have in autumn.
Don't overthink.

column3: 真的 皇上最疼小主了
column6: But it's true. His Majesty cherishes you the most.

column3: 新人入宫都一个多月了
几位答应那里皇上还没去
其余的人皇上都是淡淡的
column6:
The new concubines moved in more than a month ago.
His Majesty hasn't given anyone else much attention.

column3: 召幸得最多不说赏赐也最多
column6: You are not only most-summoned concubine, but also receive the most rewards.

column3: 青天白日的 说这个做什么
column6: You shouldn't be discussing this in broad daylight.

column3: 小主 这白的是阳春瑞雪

column6:
The white ones are called "Auspicious Spring Snow"
and the golden ones are "Cloud Soaring Dragon".

The two snuggling on one stem
resembles you and His Majesty.

column3: 你这丫头 嘴坏极了
column6: Enough with the teasing!
His Majesty the Emperor.

column3: 说什么呢 笑那么热闹
column6: Peace to Your Majesty.

column3: 也说给朕听听 起来吧
column6: What's so funny? Let me hear it.

- Rise.
- I thank Your Majesty.
How do you like the flowers?

I saw them in full bloom at the garden house,
so I had them sent to your palace.

column3: 臣妾很喜欢 多谢皇上
column6: I adore them. I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 我们小主特别喜欢菊花

column6:
Your Majesty, My Lady is very fond of chrysanthemums.
She is deeply thankful to your Majesty.

column3: 是了 你衣裳上也绣着菊花
column6: I can see that from the embroidery on your dress.
Why do you like chrysanthemums?

"The withered flowers still hold fragrance on the stem;
They never surrender or fall in the northern wind."
I like the flowers for their integrity.
You are well-read.

column3: 臣妾卖弄了 请皇上恕罪
column6: I didn't mean to show off. I seek Your Majesty's forgiveness.

column3: 朕喜欢你读书 读书能知礼
column6: I like that you read. Books teach us decorum.

column3: 可是朕更喜欢菊花独立秋风
column6:
Chrysanthemums are known for their perseverance.
But I most value their aloofness from the other spring flowers.

column3: 耐得住寂寞 才能享得住长远
column6: It endures loneliness so it can thrive in eternity.
I am thankful for Your Majesty's teaching.

column3: 再挑好的菊花来给你瞧
column6:
If you like, I will have more chrysanthemums
selected and sent to you.

column3: 对了 听说花房里有绿菊
培植了好些日子才种出来
column6:
I know the garden house has worked hard to
cultivate some green chrysanthemums to bloom.
You will have all of them.
I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 像个老学究书斋的名字
column6:
The name of your chamber sounds like it belongs
to a scholar's classroom.
How boring.

column3: 你既喜欢菊花 就叫存菊堂吧
column6:
Since you like the flowers,
I will name it the Chamber of Chrysanthemums for you.
I came today with a purpose in mind.

column3: 朕想让你学着点管家的事
column6: I want you to learn about housekeeping for the palace.

The trivial, the troublesome,
you should pay attention and learn them.
But I know nothing about housekeeping.
That's why you should learn.
You're intelligent and prudent.
I know that and appreciate it.
So I am entrusting you with this task.
Managing the palace is like running a household.

column3: 一点一滴留着心 便会管了
column6: You will gradually become proficient.
Yes, I will do my best.
That's the spirit!
You can learn anything once you put your heart into it.
The Empress is not in good health
and Consort Fleur is too quick-tempered.
I appreciate your stable personality.

column3: 以后就能帮朕料理六宫的事
column6: I hope one day you can help me manage the palace affairs.

column3: 小主 剪秋姑姑来了
column6: My Lady, Madam Autumn is here.
Peace to My Lady.

column3: 姑姑 怎么劳动您来了
column6: Please stay in bed, My Lady.
Madam, what has led you to come here personally?

column3: 小主病了这么久还不好

column6:
My Lady, Her Majesty has heard that
you are not recovering and became worried about you.
She sent me here to visit you.
I thank Her Majesty for her concern.
You look gaunt and tired.
What did the doctor say?
My Lady, it's time for medicine.
My Lady.

column3: 我家小主身子弱 又受了大惊吓
column6:
My Lady's weak constitution is still suffering
from her recent fright.

column3: 这太医的药一天三次喝下去

column6:
She's been taking the medicine three times a day
but not showing signs of recovery.

column3: 可心病呢 却要心药医
column6:
The herbs can treat illness of the body,
but there's no medicine for illness of the mind.

column3: 对了 夏常在的腿算是废了
column6: Attendant Summer's legs are no longer functional.

The imperial doctors said she can still live
but not walk anymore.

column3: 华妃说她住在延禧宫不方便

column6:
Consort Fleur said it's inconvenient for her to stay
in the Palace of Prolonging Happiness
and sent her to the Cold Palace.

column3: 不过也怪她自己不争气
column6: It's a shame, but it's her own fault.
And you've been affected too.

column3: 是我自己胆子小 不怪夏常在
column6: I'm too timid. I don't blame Attendant Xia.

column3: 不过小主病得不是时候啊
column6: Of course, but you fell ill at the wrong time.

column3: 倒是让沈贵人占了先机

column6:
Noble Lady Shen has taken advantage of it
and become the newest favored concubine.
I'm not as blessed.
I can't compare to Noble Lady Shen's Heavenly favor.

But it would be my fault if I made
Her Majesty worried about me.
Rest well, My Lady.
I will return now and visit you another time.
Mr. Kang.
Yes.
Please escort Madam out.
I take my leave.
Attendant Sourire has the face of a flower but the heart of the mouse.

column3: 这也是个中看不中用的绣花枕头
column6:
She's no more than the embroidered flowers
on a pillow: pretty, but useless.

column3: 她刚进宫 就看见血淋淋的
column6: She's new to the palace
and saw such bloodshed - how could she not be frightened?

column3: 看着娇怯怯的 倒还真没吓病着
column6: That Companion An looks effete and timid.
But she didn't get scared or ill.
Consort Fleur's demeanor is nothing new to you.

But even though you are the Third Prince's mother,
when she came to pay respects,

column3: 你不也是要先和她问好吗
column6: you had to bow to her first.
Does Your Majesty blame me for being a coward?

column3: 可是三阿哥不得皇上钟爱
column6: But the Third Prince isn't cherished by His Majesty.

column3: 臣妾又在皇上面前不得脸

column6: Nor does His Majesty value me, especially as I age.

column3: 哪比得上华妃呀年轻貌美的

column6:
I cannot compare to Consort Fleur's youth and beauty,
and her family's prominence.

You should look further into the future.
